title: Kamala Harris, Ask Steve Relationship Questions, Taraji P. Henson, Winter Talk, Male Cheerleaders, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Kamala Harris, Ask Steve Relationship Questions, Taraji P. Henson, Winter Talk, Male Cheerleaders, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Steve is extremely grateful this morning.  Kamala Harris answers the tough questions.  Uncle Steve opens up for relationship questions.  Taraji P. Henson gets her star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.  Arctic air will hit the Midwest and Northeast.  The Super Bowl will have male cheerleader for the first time this Sunday.  Closing Remarks today has the Big Dog talking about being successful and the tests that come with it, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
